title: Embodied Cognition-Based Instructional Methodology Workshop for Inclusive Educational Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational special education theory, instructional design experience, and proficiency in digital tools
context.additional_context: Learners execute real projects in special education settings, developing experiential activities using BYOD. Analyzes customized learning design cases for students with ADHD, ASD, and SLD

learning_goals: Explain at least three inclusive educational design principles based on embodied cognition theory.
Develop experiential learning modules reflecting the needs of students with ADHD/ASD/SLD using a Problem-Based Learning (PBL) approach.
Design multisensory learning scenarios utilizing augmented reality (AR), AI tools, and other technologies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
